name: NEON CHASER
description:
Neon Chaser this game is about a neon ball that chases other neon ball and build up points. It's really a simple game to play but fun. I already have some of my friends trying it out it was seemed to be fun to them so I hope it's fun for you too!

All of the information is in the ⚠GAME⚠

This is my first game development, I would like to try earning money, but it is optional, if you don't want to waste your money that's fine with me. :)
